OOC: Well, they also didn't make Waspinator or Terrorsaur into Transmetals,=
 in fact, they killed Terrorsaur instead. They also didn't make Airazor int=
o a Transmetal, in fact, they cancelled her and Tigatron out of the show. W=
ell, at least they made them into Transmetal 2's later (Tigerhawk), They di=
d a similar thing with Dinobot, even though he didn't act anything like the=
 old Dinobot, and his plot was kind of cheesy. Scorponok got ripped off no =
matter which way you look at it. And Tankor isn't a Transmetal, either. As =
for the call out attacks, thing, that's just something that they do in Anim=
e...


  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: dewboy30816@... 
  To:=
 nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, October 26, 2001 4:44 PM
  Subject=
: Re: 2


  But didn't the robots Transform into Robots in Gobots. Doug als=
o said 
  that it was a ripoff of Transformers. And who here thinks it was =

  stupid to make everyone except Rhinox a Transmetal (unless you count 
  =
Tankor)? Also wasn't stupid the way in Robots in Disguise they call 
  out =
there attacks (the only problem with the show)?

  --- In nbwrpg@y..., Allo=
ran2@a... wrote:
  > OOC: Once again, no.  Beast Wars is an American/Canadi=
an creation, 
  from 
  > Mainframe Entertainment. Same thing goes for Beas=
t Machines.  Your 
  cousins 
  > boyfriend probably mistook Silverbolt for=
 someone else since he has 
  never 
  > been in command.  Robots in Disgui=
se originated in Japan, being the 
  only 
  > Japanese Transformers series=
 so far to come to our shores. Gobots is 
  > COMPLETELY UNRELATED to Trans=
formers.  It was a rival show and 
  toyline in the 
  > 80s, but Transform=
ers was infinitely more popular(and better).
